verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Choodumade nee korake Siluvapai vrelaadu shree yesu rakshakun{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}చూడుమదే నీ కొరకే సిలువపై వ్రేలాడు శ్రీయేసు రక్షకున్{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}देख, जरा देख, तेरे लिए, क्रूस पर लटका है प्रिय यीशु तारणहार{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naluga gottabade neekai Paluka kunde maarugaa shirassuna Rakhta dhaaralu virache rekkalanu Gruchcha nee paapame, paadamulanu Cheelchenu, ballemai prakkan bodiche{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakhta siktamai momu erranayye Koyyapai choodu veepuna dunnenu Deenunigaa jese nee paapame prabhu Rakhtamu erulai paarenu, Nee korake siluvapai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gaayamaina chetulan dinamella Chaapeno paapi choochu chunde Prematho neekai kanneetini Kaarchuchu thana krupatho, sandhinchunu Paapi ninu, cheruchentan nee kshaname{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Entha kaala medpinchi velupala Nunthu vathanini theruvu hrudaya Dwaaramun pondu maaru manassunu Eediname, nee paapamul kshamiyinchunu Nee kitchu surakshananu{/lang-eng}
